_meta.description: Oracle of Secrets dungeon registry with full connectivity data
notes: grid_row = room_id >> 4, grid_col = room_id & 0xF (ALTTP room grid encoding)
stairs/holewarps extracted from ROM room headers (bytes +9 to +13)
doors inferred from grid adjacency within same dungeon (may overcount)
